casebody.data:
First Department,

June, 1940.

(June 7, 1940.) In the Matter of Acquiring Title by The City of New York to Certain Premises Situated on the Southerly Side of Lafayette Avenue, the Westerly Side of Metcalf Avenue, the Northerly Side of Lacombe Avenue and the Easterly Side of the Bronx River, in the Borough of The Bronx, City of New York, Duly Selected as a Site for Park Purposes According to Law. A. F. & G. Realty Corporation, Appellant; The City of New York, Respondent.

Final decree, so far as appealed from, unanimously affirmed, with costs to the respondent. No opinion,. Present Martin, P. J., O’Malley, Townley, Untermyer and Dore, JJ.
